name: Look Both Ways (3 Levels)
description:
Look Both Ways 

Crossing the street can be dangerous. This game puts a twist on the classic Frogger/Crossy Road street crossing gameplay by limiting player vision. Buildings, cars, and trees can obscure your vision so don’t carelessly walk into traffic. 

Controls: WASD to move. Mouse to look 

Objective: Move up the screen and safely cross the street.

Game created by: Carlin Jasper, Jake Eppard, Kenji Yoza, and Tyler Kraatz
